definition: consisting of two units, components or elements, a pre-compiled, pre-linked program that is ready to run under a given operating system
details:
adjective
- consisting of two units, components or elements
= example: consisting of two units, components or elements
- of or pertaining to a number system have 2 as its base
= example: of or pertaining to a number system have 2 as its base
noun
- a pre-compiled, pre-linked program that is ready to run under a given operating system
= example: a pre-compiled, pre-linked program that is ready to run under a given operating system
= synonyms: binary program
- a system of two stars that revolve around each other under their mutual gravitation
= synonyms: binary star
